item.title: FT Most Read: Monday, October 14, 2024 at 9:15 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Musk’s SpaceX catches returning booster rocket in technical milestone
2. Starmer vows to ‘rip out bureaucracy’ to aid growth at investment summit
3. US deploys advanced antimissile system in Israel
4. Teenage social media use strongly linked to anxiety and depression
5. Corporate debts mount as credit funds let borrowers defer payments
item.guid: FT Most Read: Monday, October 14, 2024 at 9:15 AM UTC
